data.title: 以 1 到 3 分钟谈论以下主题
data.content: What skill do you have that you could teach to others? Who would you teach this skill to and why? How do you think knowing this skill would improve their lives?
data.answer: Well, I think the skill that I could teach to others is tennis. I would teach this to those who are keen to learn it. I think learning how to play tennis can bring a lot of benefits. First of all, it is a sport that requires the use of almost all muscles in your body so playing tennis can help you lose weight and build muscles. Secondly, learning tennis can give you a healthy lifestyle not only in terms of your health but also in your social life because playing tennis with friends is a great way to socialize. Overall, teaching people to play tennis would improve their lives to a great extent.
